ygData.msgSnippet: Ooops, looks like Ipsor s Enlightenment III has all sorts of levels worth of recipies in it.  I assume the same for the next in the series, but I havn t blown
ygData.messageBody:
Ooops, looks like Ipsor's Enlightenment III has all sorts of levels worth of recipies in it. I assume the same for the next in the series, but I havn't blown 20 plat on that one yet.

But anyways, I'm certian there are more books out there! Anyone know where one can get them? Some of the Gypsy camps perhaps (Gypsy camps don't like selling to Dark elves)? If so are they written in Cobine tounge, AKA Giant?

Thanks,
Fastus, 21 Wizard, The Rathe
